Hi all,

 As some of you may have seen Squad have shown more pics of the stock fairings. Aaaaaand.. it appears that they will not separate as halves or quarters but like this instead:

 ![c4Jub1i.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/c4Jub1i.jpg)

Now, I am shocked by this. Considering that this is not how fairings release at all IRL. Also nobody who spent time and effort making stock part fairings has ever made them release this way.. And nor has any mod had fairings release like this.

 If this is true it is a terrible decision by Squad. They need to tell us if this is the case or not.

 I for one cannot believe they could make something so crappy. 

Does anyone have any new info on this??

MJ
I think I remember them mentioning you can choose and select at which seam the fairings fall apart. This just might be a glamour picture of all of them falling apart, because it looks good.

> 
> I think I remember them mentioning you can choose and select at which seam the fairings fall apart. This just might be a glamour picture of all of them falling apart, because it looks good.

Hmm, really? Where did you hear this?
I think it was on one of the Devnote Tuesdays, around the time they announced the fairings. A couple months back? Not sure, you would have to go back and check them.

I'm going to say the same as in ['the other thread'](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115867-Proper-Fairing-Separation-for-1-0): You're jumping to conclusions based on a single image. The game is under continuous development, the final version might be completely different. Bet glad you even GET fairings.

No, you're not getting my point. Things **CAN** change, things **WILL** change.

We were shown a ugly barn as tier 0 VAB. We did not get an ugly barn. Now the barn will be back.

We were shown resource mining. We did not get resource mining. Now we're getting resource mining again.

We were told the Round-8 was going to be repurposed as Xenon tank. Now it stays a regular fuel tank.
